Unisex style Stand-up Collar Top-stitched Neck and Shoulders Side-seam Inset Pockets Elastic cuffs and Waistband Full-length zipper Non-Pilling Luxurious Velour Finish 100% polyester sheered Jaquard fleece (unlined) 300 Weight Fleece Fabric (19 oz.) Style 510 Adult Fleece Jacket Features: TM     Our Jacquard fleece is knitted rathern than woven, then sheered to create an outer face that feels like velour. The interior of the jacket is unlined, showing the knit backing of the fleece. All Black Mountain Fleece products are 100% guaranteed against defects or flaws. All seams and stress points are double reinforced with our five threaded machinery and are assembled in Pinellas Park Florida, USA.     Microplush Fleecewear is softer than cotton, warmer than wool and almost as light as air. All of our fleece jackets have a luxurious velour finish, and its incredible warmth to weight ratio allows you to stay warm without being weighed down like traditional outerwear. Tiny air pockets in the fleece create an insulating zone which allows body moisture to escape while retaining body heat, making this a tremendous jacket for anybody.
